name: ReWild
description:
The game is currently in Alpha stage. Expect some bugs and crashes.

Re Wild is a mobile game that teaches the player about sustainability and respect for nature.

It is a colony management game, where you take the role of a community of islanders that have to survive as much as they can given the resources you can work with.

Key features

  • Portrait mode only, one finger needed only all the time
  • Close the game and play where you left it
